data.name: Glamify
data.description: An online commerce platform, developed in a group setting, that streamlines the purchase, sale, ordering, and payment of clothing and accessories in an agile, convenient manner, with an innovative design.

data.name: Agilix
data.description: This app is a point-of-sale system that allows users to manage accounting, record purchases, create products for sale, and improve overall business management. On this project, I collaborated with a team of four people and we applied agile methodologies such as SCRUM.

data.name: Poke App
data.description: An application designed to render Pokemon, create custom Pokemon, and sort them by type, attack, or alphabetically. It allows filtering by those from the API or those from the user-created database.

data.name: Rick & Morty
data.description: Application in which characters from the animated TV series Rick & Morty are displayed in card formats. You can search for the characters by their ID, with a range of characters of up to 826. It includes a login feature for accessing and saving favorite characters.
